org.alien4cloud.tosca.editor

Class EditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alien4cloud.tosca.editor.EditorController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value={"/rest/v2/editor","/rest/latest/editor"})
public class EditorController
extends Object
    Controller endpoint for topology edition.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/execute",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.topology.TopologyDTO> execute(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           org.alien4cloud.tosca.editor.operations.AbstractEditorOperation operation)
        Execute an operation on a topology.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The id of the topology/archive under edition.
        operation - The operation to execute

      • undoRedo

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/undo",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.topology.TopologyDTO> undoRedo(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="at")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         int at,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="lastOperationId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         String lastOperationId)
        Undo or redo operations.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The id of the topology under edition on which to undo operations.
        at - The index in the operations array to reach (0 means no operations, 1 means first operation etc.).
        lastOperationId - The id of the last operation from editor client point of view (for optimistic locking).
        Returns:
        A topology DTO with the updated topology.

      • upload

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/upload",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.topology.TopologyDTO> upload(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="lastOperationId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         String lastOperationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="path")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         String path,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  throws IOException
        Method exposed to REST to upload a file in an archive under edition.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The id of the topology/archive under edition.
        lastOperationId - The id of the user last known operation (for optimistic locking edition).
        path - The path in which to save/override the file in the archive.
        file - The file to save in the archive.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • downloadTempFile

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/file/{artifactId:.+}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.InputStreamResource> downloadTempFile(@PathVariable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   String artifactId)
        Download a temporary file which is not yet commited (uploaded or modified through an operation).
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The if of the topology.
        artifactId - The id of the temporary artifact.
        Returns:
        The response entity with the input stream of the file.

      • save

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.topology.TopologyDTO> save(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="lastOperationId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String lastOperationId)
        Save the given topology and commit to the local git repository.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The id of the topology/archive under edition to save.
        lastOperationId - The id of the last operation from editor client point of view (for optimistic locking).
        Returns:
        A topology DTO with the updated topology.

      • recover

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/recover",
                method=PUT,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.topology.TopologyDTO> recover(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="lastOperationId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String lastOperationId)
        Recovers the topology after a dependency have change. This will apply the registered recovery operations and save the topology
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The id of the topology/archive under edition to save.
        Returns:
        A topology DTO with the updated topology.

      • reset

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/reset",
                method=PUT,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.topology.TopologyDTO> reset(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="lastOperationId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      String lastOperationId)
        Reset a topology. This will delete everything inside the topology, leaving it as if it is just created now.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The id of the topology/archive under edition to save.
        Returns:
        A topology DTO with the updated topology.

      • clearCache

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/clearCache",
                method=PUT,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Void> clearCache(@RequestParam(value="force")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Boolean force)
        Clear the edition cache.
        Parameters:
        force -
        Returns:
        Void

      • pull

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/git/pull",
                method=PUT,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.topology.TopologyDTO> pull(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        EditorGitUserDTO gitUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="remoteBranch",defaultValue="master",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        String remoteBranch)
        Pull modifications from a git repository. If a conflict occurs when pulling the repository, an exception will be throw asking the end user to manually revolve the merge.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The id of the topology.
        gitUser - The git credentials if any.
        remoteBranch - The name of the remote branch to pull from (default: 'master').
        Returns:
        An empty RestResponse.

      • push

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/git/push",
                method=PUT,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Void> push(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            EditorGitUserDTO gitUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            @RequestParam(name="remoteBranch",defaultValue="master",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            String remoteBranch)
        Push modifications to a git repository. If a conflict occurs when pushing the repository:
        • It will create push the current commits to a temporary branch.
        • Then will re-branch the local branch to the last commit of the remote branch.
        • Finally a runtime exception will be thrown asking the end user to manually revolve the merge.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - the id of the topology.
        gitUser - The git credentials if any.
        remoteBranch - The name of the remote branch to push to (default: 'master).
        Returns:
        An empty RestResponse.

      • setRemote

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/git/remote",
                method=PUT,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Void> setRemote(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   String topologyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="remoteUrl")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   String remoteUrl)
        Set the remote git repository url.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - the id of the topology.
        remoteUrl - The git url of the remote repository.
        Returns:
        An empty RestResponse.

      • getRemote

        @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @RequestMapping(value="/{topologyId:.+}/git/remote",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<EditorGitRemoteDTO> getRemote(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String topologyId)
        Get the url of the git repository.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - The id of the topology.
        Returns:
        The url of the git repository of the topology.
